content: BX 3-ME-22 Cordless concrete nailer (M&E edition) Nuron battery-powered fastening tool for installing cables, conduits and threaded studs to concrete, steel and masonry (max. nail length 24 mm│15/16”) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Developed specifically for electrical contractors – this fully electric nailer with 20-nail magazine is a much faster, more consistent alternative to drilling and anchoring (even for threaded studs), helping you to save time with every fastening Uncompromised cordless performance – drive up to 850 nails per charge thanks to revolutionary Nuron batteries and the more efficient brushless motor More consistent fastening quality – the combination of mechanical drive and high-hardness concrete pins make it easier to create more reliable fastening points every time, with lower noise, recoil, maintenance and no gas costs or user certification Smart features – the tool automatically primes for the first fastening when you pick it up. Active troubleshooting via the ON!Track app and a nail refill indicator also help you avoid downtime on the jobsite Engineered for better handling – contoured grip, short stroke and LED light help you work more comfortably when driving hundreds of nails per day Applications Fastening cables and conduits to concrete and steel (max. nail length 24 mm) Fastening M6/W6 threaded studs to steel or concrete Fastening drywall track to concrete and steel (optional IF nailer nose recommended) Fastening membranes, mesh and sheeting to concrete Fastening cables and conduits to concrete and steel (max. nail length 15/16”) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimensions (LxWxH): 18.7 x 5.3 x 11.6 in Tool body weight: 7.6 lb.
